text:
Hey team, looking to work with Andrew Clark for Big W. 
            Budget is approx $4,306 - need 1 x Product photography, 3 x Blog post, 3 x Blog post, 3 x Lifestyle photography, 3 x Pinterest pin. 3 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 9 months. Start date: December 2025. Need to confirm: deliverables
